metadata.dc:author: Schiattino, M I
Lolas Stepke, F
Sanfuentes, M T
metadata.dc:description: This paper presents a reanalysis of previously collected data using multivariate statistical methods. Aside from confirming the discrimination between obese, and normal-weight women through psychometric indicators including a personality evaluation, and a verbal affective expression assessment, the power of multivariate methods for improving diagnosis is illustrated.
metadata.dc:title: Sobrepeso y obesidad en mujeres chilenas caracterización multivariada basada sobre indicadores psicofisiológicos.
[Overweight and obesity in Chilean women. A multivariate characterization based on psychophysiologic indicators].
metadata.dc:publisher: Acta psiquiatrica y psicologica de America latina
